name: ShigellosisTestsForShigellaSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Shigellosis (Tests for Shigella species Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Shigella nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: shigella nucleic acid;),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
